Syntax Cheatsheet: проверка русского Phrase Emphasis

italic bold italic bold

Links Inline: An example Reference-style labels (titles are optional): An example. Then, anywhere else in the doc, define the link:

Images Inline (titles are optional): Reference-style:

H1

## H2 ### H3 #### H4 ##### H5 ###### H6

Alternatively, for H1 and H2, an underline-ish style:

Alt-H1

Alt-H2

Ordered, without paragraphs:

  1. Foo
  2. Bar

Unordered, with paragraphs:

  • A list item.

    With multiple paragraphs.

  • Bar

You can nest them:

  • Abacus
    • answer
  • Bubbles
    1. bunk
    2. bupkis
      • BELITTLER
    3. burper
  • Cunning Blockquotes

Email-style angle brackets
are used for blockquotes.

And, they can be nested.

Headers in blockquotes

  • You can quote a list.
  • Etc. Code Spans <code> spans are delimited by backticks.

You can include literal backticks like `this`. Preformatted Code Blocks Indent every line of a code block by at least 4 spaces or 1 tab. This is a normal paragraph.

This is a preformatted
code block.

Horizontal Rules Three or more dashes or asterisks:

Manual Line Breaks:

End a line with two or more spaces:
Roses are red,
Violets are blue.
